Hi,

I already posted this a while ago, but didn't get a response! Anyone g=
ot a hint on the following problem!

I was using the the seed http://www.jk=
u.at (domain of my university) to develop and test my focused crawler based=
 on heritrix 2. With this seed crawling worked fine.

Now I tried to use ot=
her random seed domains (e.g. http://www.archive.org) and suddenly my crawl=
 stalls right at the start?!?

If I use the IP adresses instead of the doma=
in names as seeds the crawl stops and does not stall!?

I get "Failed to cr=
awl seed, will retry" in the seed report.

I tried it with the standard unc=
hanged 2.0.2 distribution and the standard profiles and got the same result=
?!?

Anyone got an explanation for this strange behavior?

Im running on wi=
ndows and from localhost:8080 from my home (which is not part of the jku.at=
 domain)

Thanks for any help

Georgie
